thread.title: Oscars praise diversity as 'Shape of Water' wins big

title: Oscars praise diversity as 'Shape of Water' wins big
text:
Oscars praise diversity as 'Shape of Water' wins big 6:22am EST - 01:49 
Romantic fantasy“The Shape of Water” won the best picture Oscar on Sunday, the film industry’s most prestigious honor, on a night where themes of female empowerment and activism almost overshadowed the awards.   
Romantic fantasy“The Shape of Water” won the best picture Oscar on Sunday, the film industry’s most prestigious honor, on a night where themes of female empowerment and activism almost overshadowed the awards.  //reut.rs/2I45kNW
